SummaryEnglish: Shot entirely from the point of view of the security cameras. Adam Rifkin’s LOOK follows several interweaving, storylines over the course of a random week in a random city. LOOK is a film about the things that people do when they don’t know they’re being watched.

1.SummaryEnglish: Americans are captured on surveillance cameras at least 170 times a day mostly without their knowledge. This produces millions of hours of footage revealing the nature of those hidden secrets.

The opener features two mini-mart slackers confronting a homeless man; a pair of attractive high-school girls with plans for romance; and a guy being pelted with paintballs. Meanwhile, a trophy wife rues having children; and a strip-club patron talks a dancer into a special kind of lap dance.

2.SummaryEnglish: A cokehead hides her habit; Molly learns that Hannah is planning to hook up with Shane; fans recognize Dan the Weatherman; and the rousted homeless man returns to the mini-mart with revenge on his mind, which throws a kink into Willie and Carl's in-store concert plan.

3.SummaryEnglish: A jailhouse cell offers Ron a break from living on the streets; Stella repeatedly cheats on Leonard; Andy challenges Dan to work on his image; Shane and his friends take Hannah and Molly to the mini-mart concert, where Willie brings down the house.

4.SummaryEnglish: Willie is upset to learn that no industry executives attended his concert, and Carl tries to ameliorate things by suggesting they produce a music video; Leonard and Stella's son's behavior precipitates a sit-down with his teacher. Meanwhile, Hannah and Molly secretly text each other in school about Molly's date with Shane; and Homeless Ron gets out of jail.

5.SummaryEnglish: Molly and Hannah skip school, unaware that a rapist is on the loose in the area; Dan the Weatherman is concerned his daughter does not like him and doesn't realize Andy is scheming to get him fired.

6.SummaryEnglish: Despite Molly's affection for Shane, Hannah puts the moves on him; Dan tries out a new look; Leonard and Stella get in a heated altercation in front of their children; a missing child kicks off a frantic search by mall security guards.

7.SummaryEnglish: While scanning tapes of the concert, a jealous Willie catches Amanda carrying on with some guy; Ron takes a swim in the pool at a shady motel; Shane and Molly go on a date, but he takes off early to be with Hannah, who's made him a promise; and Andy and Armani continue to meet after hours.

8.SummaryEnglish: Stella gets nabbed shoplifting, and Leonard, who has a checkered past of his own, shows little support; Dan goes out of his way again to embarrass Andy on TV, but takes him out for a drink afterward; Dan's daughter and her crew party it up at a local strip club.

9.SummaryEnglish: After getting kicked out of a strip club, a group of the teens head out to play paintball; Tom gets stung in a sting; Carl does his best to cheer up Willie, who's broken up with Amanda; Armani offers Dan a free lap dance and Andy encourages him to jump on it.

10.SummaryEnglish: A frightening view of the Iraq War is seen through a soldier's helmet camera; Tom winds up in jail and needs Stella to bail him out; Willie's dad pays a surprise visit; Dan gets a gratis lap dance.

11.SummaryEnglish: In the season finale, the rapist continues to prowl the neighborhood; the fur flies when Molly learns that Hannah has been seeing Shane behind her back; Dan's recent indiscretion comes back to haunt him; and Willie's dream just might become a reality.
